Windlord::

Windlord said to his friend Aerotaur "Aerotaur I think that Grounded 
is trying to say that we munst become in someone like Deemos, Deemos 
acts like a barbaric... or worse -we should become the type of person 
that we're fighttting"and he added "I feel that we should speak with 
Maximals... At least with Hot Rod, they have to help us... at least 
give us advice or find other faction that can help us"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He tilts his head at Grounded, "So your word is law?  No 
matter."  He 
> smirks and turns back to Sarge and glares.  "We will have to decide 
this 
> later."  He paces around the room, until Arrow speaks up.  "I 
hadn't noticed 
> that they were Maximals however, I still think we should work with 
them.  For 
> one thing they owe us for aiding in the protection of their base on 
one, 
> perhaps two occasions, and we saved one of their pods from the 
Alliance.  
> They should be ... receptive."
